description: Betty Jean Evans, 91, of Janesville, died on Friday at Oak Park Place, Janesville. Arrangements with Henke-Clarson Funeral Home, Janesville. Arrangements are pending with Brian Mark Funeral Home, Beloit.
text:
Evans

Betty Jean Evans, 91, of Janesville, died on Friday at Oak Park Place,
Janesville. Private graveside services will be held at Spring Grove Cemetery,
Delavan. Arrangements with Henke-Clarson Funeral Home, Janesville.

Pfaff

Beulah A. "Bea" Pfaff, 84, of Chetek, Wisconsin, formerly of Rockton, passed
away on Thursday. A private graveside service will be held. Celebration of
life at a later date. Arrangements with Burnham-Ours-Kolstad Family Funeral
Home, Chetek.

Kepler

Norma L. Kepler, 81, of Beloit, died on Sunday at her home. Arrangements are
pending with Brian Mark Funeral Home, Beloit.

Makovec

Norma I. Makovec, 95, of Beloit, passed away on Friday at Willowick, Clinton.
Arrangements are pending with Daley Murphy Wisch & Associates Funeral Home and
Crematorium, Beloit.

Olson

Harold C. Olson, 73, of Janesville, died Friday at St. Mary's Hospital,
Madison. Graveside services will be at 11 a.m. on Wednesday at Oak Hill
Cemetery, Janesville. Arrangements with Henke-Clarson Funeral Home,
Janesville.

org: Daley Murphy Wisch & Associates Funeral Home
companies: Daley Murphy Wisch & Associates Funeral Home
